TEXT.TITLE: RESTAURANT ASSOCIATES INC <RA> 4TH QTR JAN 3
TEXT.BODY: Shr 25 cts vs 36 cts Net 1.4 mln vs 1.4 mln Revs 56.9 mln vs 35.1 mln Year Shr 86 cts vs 75 cts Net 4.7 mln vs 3.0 mln REvs 201.4 mln vs 140.0 mln NOTE:1985 4th qtr includes 99,000 loss from carryforward. Shares restated to give effect to 1.4 to one stock split in the form a 40 pct class A dividend in August 1985. Reuter
